Johansen Procedure

Jul 25, 2015

require(urca)
## Loading required package: urca
## Loading required package: methods
da=read.table('d-bhp0206.txt',header=T);
## Warning in file(file, "rt"): cannot open file 'd-bhp0206.txt': No such
## file or directory
## Error in file(file, "rt"): cannot open the connection
da1=read.table('d-vale0206.txt',header=T);
## Warning in file(file, "rt"): cannot open file 'd-vale0206.txt': No
## such file or directory
## Error in file(file, "rt"): cannot open the connection
# log close
bhp=log(da[,9]);
## Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'da' not found
vale=log(da1[,9]);
## Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'da1' not found
par(mfrow=c(2,1))
plot(bhp,type='l');
## Error in plot(bhp, type = "l"): error in evaluating the argument 'x' in selecting a method for function 'plot': Error: object 'bhp' not found
plot(vale,type='l');
## Error in plot(vale, type = "l"): error in evaluating the argument 'x' in selecting a method for function 'plot': Error: object 'vale' not found
x=cbind(bhp,vale)
## Error in cbind(bhp, vale): object 'bhp' not found
m1=ar(x)
## Error in ar.yw(x, aic = aic, order.max = order.max, na.action = na.action, : object 'x' not found
#m1$order
m2=ca.jo(x,K=2,spec='transitory')
## Error in as.matrix(x): object 'x' not found
summary(m2)
## Error in summary(m2): error in evaluating the argument 'object' in selecting a method for function 'summary': Error: object 'm2' not found

By setting K=2,spec=’transitory’, we fit the following model (See urca’s manual.)

…transitory lag = K-1, level lag = 1

rel =  x %*% m2@V;
## Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'x' not found
par(mfrow=c(2,1))
plot(rel[,1],type = 'l')
## Error in plot(rel[, 1], type = "l"): error in evaluating the argument 'x' in selecting a method for function 'plot': Error: object 'rel' not found
plot(rel[,2],type = 'l')
## Error in plot(rel[, 2], type = "l"): error in evaluating the argument 'x' in selecting a method for function 'plot': Error: object 'rel' not found
